How They Train Red Rocks, Rule!

Red Rocks is a popular amphitheater that many travellers come to for musical performances. While it is a very energetic place to be many athletes utilize the space for active training. Being able to scale the large rocks is very difficult so the workout that they recieve from the area is no easy feat. Check out the link below!
